text: Logan Wade Lerman (born January 19, 1992) is an American actor. He played Percy Jackson in the 2010 film Percy Jackson & the Olympians: The Lightning Thief, directed by Chris Columbus. He also played "Charlie" in a movie of the book Perks of Being a Wallflower. Lerman's other movie roles include Hoot (2006), 3:10 to Yuma, a western (2007), Gamer (2009), and The Three Musketeers (2011), as d'Artagnan. He starred on the series Jack & Bobby (2004 to 2005). Lerman was born in Beverly Hills, California. His parents are both Jewish. He has two siblings, both older, and is a self-described "film geek". He would like to direct and write films in the future. == Other websites == * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Beverly Hills, California Category:American movie actors
title: Logan Lerman
